content: I purchased the apl accidentally a d haven't even installed or used. I need the refund on the purchase

replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. There should be a continue button in the game mode selection. Did you already see and tried it?

content: Enjoy the game play but navigation bar gets in the way. The game used to hide the navigation bar once the app started. Now the navigation bar remains and interfere with game plays. This is the only app I have where the navigation bar remains.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We will fix it with the next update.

content: Why is the flag for English the US one instead of the UK one?

I will up my scores if you change the English flag from USA to UK (or have both as many do). Additionally the app thinks slower than i do. Lastly, sound is fine but I turn it off. The dice rolling sound is like a scurrying invertebrates. Please have an an Undo for accidents. Screen is a little bright. Nice different sound effects for each part of scoring. I had two 26 scores but it doesn't show both. Please change the red tick to a red cross if you can't go. Played 400+ in a week!
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We will see what we can do!

content: solid app (especially like the inclusion of digital dice), though why does it keep locking me out of using certain dice in solo mode when I could easily make use of them?
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. In general dice should only be locked if the are not allowed to use in the current situation. Perhaps you could send a screenshot, so we can check if it isn't a bug.

content: Two players on one device is amazing
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you like it. Two players on one device is also our favourite / most used mode.
Thanks a lot! We are glad you like it!

content: Fantastic app. Hope they implement the other 3 scorepads at some point!
replyContent: Thank you for your positive feedback. The score pads 4-6 are available as an IAP now.

content: Enjoy the game but the app crashes out half way through about a third of the time. Edit: No error message.  Crash to home screen. Pixel 2.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Do you get an error message you can send to our support mail address? support@outline-development.de Edit: Thanks a lot for this information. We just released an update (1.0.2 - Build 122) which should fix the problem. We would be happy if you could test and give us some feedback!

content: I really wish they would update the solo rules. I know it's not the app's fault, but the solo rules for this game stink. Just thru some unlucky die rolls, you can end up skipping your last 3 turns.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We will keep an eye on this - perhaps we can add a special rule / option.

content: It has quickly become one of my favorite games.
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you like it!

content: App is excellent. The game is great, and the implementation on the phone is well done. There is a scoring bug in the duel mode - second player to complete a color should receive 3 points, not 5, unless they complete it on the same turn.
replyContent: Thank you for your positive feedback. We found the problem you described and fixed it in the current version 1.0.1! Thanks a lot for reporting!

content: Wonderful implementation. Easy to play, and addictive!
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! We are glad you like it!

content: I love this app, the solo plays are super quick, so I have easily played three dozen plays since downloading yesterday. I especially love that the extra pad colors are included at no cost. I have only played the standard version in real life, so I greatly appreciate the chance to try the extra variants. I find them a bit harder than the standard pad, my scores tend to be lower when playing them- which I like the harder difficulty! After so many plays, the only thing missing from this very extremely well done app is an undo button. There have been a couple times where after I have started crossing a section, I have realized a better spot. Which this isnt a problem if there is another space on the board, if you click there the X you started crossing will move and you can essentially 'do over' but as the game continues and you get down to the last few spaces, there many not be another potentional spot. And you cannot 'reset' within the same color block. So i often end up dividing the block up into multiple smaller 1 blocks, where starting from a different location may have left them in a group of 2 or 3 instead. My only nitpicky complaint. Otherwise it works extremely well. Scores have ranged from 5 to 39 across the many many games played, trying to break my record of 39 is quite difficult but I enjoy the challenge!
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Glad you like our app. You can always remove the last crosses by tapping on one of the selected dice. Hope this helps!
Thank you for your positive feedback! We are glad you like it. If you have any suggestions, don't hesitate to ask.
